name: Haagen-Dazs Ice Cream, Vanilla Bean, 14 oz (Frozen)
short_description: HÄAGEN-DAZS Vanilla Bean Ice Cream is the essence of elegance and sophistication in one perfectly portioned 14-oz. container
Made with the finest ingredients: cream, skim milk, cane sugar, egg yolks, ground vanilla beans, and vanilla extract

HÄAGEN-DAZS ice cream is gluten-free, has no GMO ingredients, and uses milk and cream from cows not treated with the growth hormone rBST* *No significant difference has been shown between milk from rBST treated and non-rBST treated cows
Transported using a chilled shipping method to arrive frozen
Take a moment to indulge your senses with a sweet reward that's under every lid
All Natural
Made From the best ingredients on Earth
14 oz
product_description: HÄAGEN-DAZS Vanilla Bean Ice Cream is a combination of sweet cream, Madagascar vanilla and finely ground vanilla beans that creates the sweet scent of exotic spice and a distinctive taste that lingers on your tongue. With only a few ingredients: cream, skim milk, cane sugar, egg yolks, ground vanilla beans, and vanilla extract, HÄAGEN-DAZS is dedicated to making the best tasting ice cream possible. We pride ourselves in using only the finest ingredients to make every bite of our ice cream one you'll love.

name: Talenti Gelato For a Delicious Frozen Dessert Madagascan Vanilla Bean Made with Ingredients 1 pint
short_description: Talenti Madagascan Vanilla Bean Gelato is slow cooked, creamy vanilla gelato with Madagascan vanilla beans and a hint of lemon zest for a unique Talenti twist.
We add a hint of lemon zest to our Madagascan Vanilla Bean gelato for a one-of-a-kind taste that's anything but plain vanilla.
Talenti Madagascan Vanilla Bean gelato is a gluten-free frozen dessert.
All Talenti Gelato flavors are OU-D Kosher Certified and are crafted with non-GMO ingredients.
Talenti does not use high fructose corn syrup in any of our frozen dessert products.
Starting Jan 1, 2020, Talenti Gelato and Sorbetto Jars have been made with 100% Recycled Plastic
product_description: If you’re looking for delicious, you’ve found the perfect frozen dessert. Talenti Madagascan Vanilla Bean Gelato is our unique take on the classic vanilla ice cream flavor. Talenti Madagascan Vanilla Bean Gelato is slow cooked, creamy vanilla gelato with Madagascan vanilla beans and a hint of lemon zest for a unique Talenti twist. The result is a one-of-a-kind taste that's anything but plain vanilla. At Talenti, we believe the best process and ingredients result in delicious gelato and sorbetto. There are no shortcuts when it comes to crafting the most delicious gelatos and sorbettos. That’s why we source the highest-quality ingredients from all around the world. Then, we package our products in clear, BPA-free jars that can be recycled and reused any way you like. Please note that Talenti jars are not microwave or dishwasher safe. (For clever reuse ideas, check out #Pintcycling on Instagram). In addition to Talenti Gelato, Talenti has Dairy-Free Sorbettos, Organic Gelato and Gelato Layers -- 5 layers of the ultimate indulgence. All our products are made with non-GMO sourced ingredients which have been evaluated by Where Food Comes From, Inc., and adhere to our Non-GMO Sourced Standards.

name: Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream Milk and Cookies 16 oz
short_description: Ice Cream
Made With Natural Ingredients
Non-Gmo
product_description: Ben & Jerry's Vanilla ice cream pint with a chocolate cookie swirl, chocolate chip and chocolate chocolate chip cookies. Cookie madness, mixed with vanilla ice cream-has your inner cookie monster exploded with joy yet? It almost seems unfair to stack the deck like this. If the best part of your school day was sitting down to a plate of cookies and a glass of milk after you got home, is it fair to improve on that experience? We'd like to say no-but then this flavor came along. Not only do you get the perfect ratio of vanilla ice cream to cookie (no sogginess here!), you also get two kinds of cookies-regular old chocolate chip, and chocolate-chocolate chip. Oh, yes. We delved into the double-chocolate territory. And to make it even better, we also added a chocolate cookie swirl, just to maximize your cookie-eating experience. We're sorry. (Just don't tell your 8-year-old self that your favorite treat...just got even favorite-r). And we'll admit: we also like playing favorites with ingredients, too. Which is why all of Ben & Jerry's ice cream flavors are made with non-GMO sourced ingredients, and eggs from cage-free hens. In addition, the cocoa, sugar, and vanilla in Milk & Cookies come from Fairtrade certified producers-and this cookie-lover flavor also comes wrapped up in sustainably sourced packaging.

name: Breyers Ice Cream For a Delicious Frozen Dessert Natural Strawberry with 100% Grade A Milk and Cream 48 oz
short_description: Breyers Natural Strawberry Ice Cream is made with non-GMO sourced ingredients and packed with sun-ripened California strawberries picked at the peak of happiness
This ice cream is made with fresh cream, sugar, and milk
Partnering with American farmers for 100% Grade A milk and cream, making this a delicious frozen dessert perfect for an ice cream cone or ice cream sandwich
Made in accordance to our Breyers Pledge, starting with high-quality ingredients and ending in the best strawberry ice cream
Gluten-free and Kosher dairy ice cream for everyday indulgence
Breyers ice cream is made with 100% sustainable fruit and vanilla
All Natural Ice Cream
W/Fresh Milk & Cream
Kosher
product_description: Sun-ripened California strawberries – so good! AND swirled around delicious Breyers ice cream? What could be a better dessert? Our Breyers Natural Strawberry Ice Cream is packed with strawberries picked at the peak of happiness! Did we mention that our strawberries are also 100% sustainably sourced? In fact, our Natural Strawberry is delicious all around. We start with ingredients like milk, fresh cream, sugar, and strawberries to give you a delicious frozen dessert. Our strawberries are pretty great, but that milk and cream is special, too! We only use 100% Grade A milk and cream from American cows not treated with artificial growth hormones*. And to boot, we use colors and flavors from natural sources and sustainable vanilla from Madagascar. Breyers Natural Strawberry is also made with non-GMO sourced ingredients. Back in 1866 when William Breyer started his small ice cream operation in Philly, he also valued the quality of his ingredients. So much so, that he created a Pledge of Purity to stand behind the quality of his ice cream. More than 150 years later, we still follow his same principles with our Pledge to use only high-quality ingredients in our desserts. We hope you agree that’s what makes our Breyers Natural Strawberry so good! *The FDA states that no significant difference has been shown between dairy derived from rBST-treated and non-rBST-treated cows.

name: Ben & Jerry's Vanilla Caramel Fudge Ice Cream Pint, One PINT(473 ML)
short_description: Vanilla Ice Cream with Swirls of Caramel & Fudge
Ben & Jerry's
Kosher certified dairy
product_description: Ben & Jerry's ice cream pint with Vanilla ice cream, a gooey caramel swirl and fudge swirls. If you've been looking for reasons to try something chunk-free from Ben & Jerry's, then this flavor packs a punch. Vanilla-rich, fudge-a-licious, and caramel-gooey-it's pint perfection. Enjoy! 1994 was a crazy year. The hit television show Friends debuted, Amazon and Yahoo both launched, and Ace of Base topped the charts. Yet, all of that pales in comparison to the year's greatest gift to humanity...the unveiling of Ben & Jerry's Vanilla Caramel Fudge premium ice cream. It received rave reviews, melted spoons, and ruled the red carpet. Yet fame and fortune never got to its head. Here we are over two decades later, and this classic still satisfies fans looking for a smooth and creamy flavor that is free of Ben & Jerry's trademark chunks. The 90s may be a blur, but what remains is Ben & Jerry's commitment to producing the world's best homemade ice cream in the most responsible way possible. Like all of our frozen dessert flavors, Vanilla Caramel Fudge is made with Non-GMO sourced ingredients, cage-free eggs, and Fairtrade-certified cocoa, sugar, and vanilla. Responsibly sourced packaging gets this ice cream pint from our Vermont factory to your freezer.
